definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: The command outputs should be self-explanatory.
sentences.chinese: 这些命令输出应该是非常简单明了的。

sentences.english: In the homespun wisdom of Jackie Chan, the way forward is simple.
sentences.chinese: 以成龙的朴素智慧，其前进方向也很简单明了。

sentences.english: All such memory-enhancing techniques, called mnemonics, transform new information into more easily remembered formulations.
sentences.chinese: 这种记忆强化法将新知识转化为简单明了易记的形式。

sentences.english: They were indifferent to money, wordly possesions and pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为钱无关紧要，说话简单明了和快乐。

sentences.english: In addition, the son has struggled to write legibly.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她儿子对于简单明了的写字显得很吃力。

sentences.english: The Austrian recipe for economic crisis is very simple and requires little action on the part of government.
sentences.chinese: 奥地利人的政策措施简单明了，也不需要政府做什么。

sentences.english: The code you write will be straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 您编写的代码将会简单明了。

sentences.english: Most of the book is about straight-up financial planning, though.
sentences.chinese: 书中的大部分内容都是简单明了的财务计划。

sentences.english: Their appeal lies in their utter simplicity. You do not need to understand a complex system of betting, as in craps.
sentences.chinese: 老虎机的魅力在于其彻底的简单明了。

sentences.english: Associating a page with a datapool is straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 将页面同数据池相关联是一项简单明了的操作。

sentences.english: For all roles, there's a clear, hierarchical folder structure that is intuitive to navigate.
sentences.chinese: 所有角色都有一个层次分明的目录结构，简单明了。

sentences.english: The key is to keep the report concise and simple. Avoid jargon and use Plain English.
sentences.chinese: 报告关键在于简单明了，要用大白话，不要使用行话。

sentences.english: Exploration testing the new model is fairly straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 对新模型的探察测试简单明了。

sentences.english: Agency and Partnership, by contrast, seemed straightforward enough.
sentences.chinese: 相反，“代理与合伙人”这门课则显得很简单明了。

sentences.english: Be concise and succinct in all descriptions and avoid the use pronouns and articles (a, an, the) whenever possible.
sentences.chinese: 任何描述都要简单明了，尽可能不要使用代词或冠词。

sentences.english: Critics of this system argue for the simplicity of direct election.
sentences.chinese: 不赞成这种制度的人士认为直接选举更简单明了。
